synonyms.synonym: eIF-2B GDP-GTP exchange factor subunit beta

protein.specific_function: Catalyzes the exchange of eukaryotic initiation factor 2-bound GDP for GTP

reference.reference_text: Sherrington R, Rogaev EI, Liang Y, Rogaeva EA, Levesque G, Ikeda M, Chi H, Lin C, Li G, Holman K, et al.: Cloning of a gene bearing missense mutations in early-onset familial Alzheimer's disease. Nature. 1995 Jun 29;375(6534):754-60.
